Class AppointmentCSVOperator

java.lang.Object
CSV.CSVoperator
CSV.AppointmentCSVOperator
public class AppointmentCSVOperator extends CSVoperator
The AppointmentCSVOperator class handles operations related to reading from and writing to the appointment data CSV file. It provides methods for reading specific appointment data, adding new appointment records, changing specific information in an appointment, and updating the CSV file for administrative purposes. This class extends CSVoperator and provides synchronized methods for ensuring thread safety when modifying the appointment CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentCSVOperator

      public AppointmentCSVOperator()
      Constructs an AppointmentCSVOperator instance. Initializes the file path to the default appointment CSV file location.

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public ArrayList<String> readFile(String id, int role)
      Reads the appointment CSV file and returns the specific data based on the user's role.
      Specified by:
      readFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID used to filter the data (e.g., patient ID, doctor ID).
      role - The role of the user that determines which data is retrieved:
      • 0: Patient role
      • 1: Doctor role
      • 2: Administrator role (skip the first line)
      • 3: Administrator role (skip the first line, for a different purpose)
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the filtered data from the CSV file.

    • getCounter

      public Integer getCounter()
      Gets the current line count for the appointment CSV file.
      Returns:
      The number of lines read from the file.

    • addLineToFile

      public boolean addLineToFile(List<String> dataAdd)
      Adds a new line to the appointment CSV file.
      Specified by:
      addLineToFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      dataAdd - A list of strings containing the data to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the new line is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • changeSpecificInformation

      public boolean changeSpecificInformation(String id, ArrayList<Integer> changesIndex, ArrayList<String> changes)
      Changes specific information in a particular appointment record identified by its ID.
      Specified by:
      changeSpecificInformation in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to be updated.
      changesIndex - An ArrayList of indexes specifying which columns to update.
      changes - An ArrayList of strings representing the new values for the specified columns.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteSpecificLine

      public boolean deleteSpecificLine(String id)
      Deletes a specific line from the appointment CSV file based on the appointment ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteSpecificLine in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the line is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • updateCSVForAdmin

      public boolean updateCSVForAdmin(ArrayList<String> dataStore)
      Updates the CSV file with new data for the administrator. This method overwrites the first line and appends the new data below it.
      Parameters:
      dataStore - An ArrayList containing the new data to be stored.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
